markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Force Fang](/Feats.aspx?ID=2850) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=389" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 43 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
focus pool

</column>

---

You can turn your attack into an unerring blur of force. You learn the [_force fang_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1038) conflux spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
name: Force Fang
